content.title: Import the Native App
content.body:
1. From the main menu of the Iris, navigate to Forge > Browse.
    The Volt MX Forge window appears
  2. On the search bar, enter, Recipients Mobile.
  3. In the list that appears, select Recipients Mobile.
    The details of the Recipients Mobile appears.
  4. Click Import to Workspace.
    It may take some time for Iris to import the app.
